page.title: 06VILLAGE LIFE, BENINGTON (1)
page.content: The present population is 1000. There are two places of worship,St.Pet- er's Church and a Methodist Chapel. The church holds the following regular ser- vices: Holy Communion, Family Service, Morning & Evening Prayer. About 14 reg- ularly attend Morning Service,50-60 the Children's Service held monthly.At Spe- cial Services the attendance increases, ie. 150 people at Christmas Midnight Service. The church performs approx. 6 marriages, 9 baptisms and 10 burials a year. The Rector also visits the local school several days a week to take Ass- embly.The Methodist Chapel holds a reg- ular evening service at 6.30 p.m. There is only one shop in the village, Benington Store. Old people are cared for in the village by the community accepting responsibil- ity and "keeping an eye on them."(Cont)
